Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Carmelo
Reviews.Content: This extremely thin 10.1" tablet at 0.27 inches thick has with realistic display with a full color spectrum. Water-resistant up to three feet for up to 30 minutes. Controls your equipment with universal remote & TV apps. Easy one-touch connectivity between compatible devices. HD cameras with Exmor R® for mobile: 8MP rear, 2MP front. Virtual surround-sound technology. Up to 9 hours battery life. SnapdragonTM S4 Pro quad-core 1.5 GHz processor. Operating Platform: Android 4.1 Jelly Bean; Processor: Snapdragon S4 Pro APQ8064 Cortex-A9 Quad Core.I love the clear picture and clear sound.

ProductInfo.Name: Xperia Tablet Z, Android Jellybean, 10.1", 16GB, Wi-Fi
